pullrequest.title: Allow IMU orientation specification in SDF. Add orientation specification of SphericalCoordinate world frame.

content.raw:
Can you remove the "imu_" prefix from "imu_localization"? It is already a child under `<imu>`, so the `imu` prefix feel redundant. 

This should probably be an element. Quoting from the www school "Use attributes only to provide information that is not relevant to the data." I think this attribute is data, correct?
content.html:
Can you remove the "imu_" prefix from "imu_localization"? It is already a child under <imu>, so the imu prefix feel redundant.

This should probably be an element. Quoting from the www school "Use attributes only to provide information that is not relevant to the data." I think this attribute is data, correct?
